themes: direct communication with small businesses and artists
key_phrases: more advertisement of these programs/opportunities directly to small businesses, underrepresented artists, organizations, and communities
a set percentage of all awardees should reside, work in and/or are constituents of these communities
barriers_identified: lack of direct advertisement to intended communities
insufficient representation of target communities among awardees
solutions_proposed: increase advertisement and outreach directly to small businesses, underrepresented artists, organizations, and communities
establish a set percentage of awardees who are residents, workers, or constituents of these communities
